Public Member Functions

NT3D_glx_drv_o Class Reference

NT3D_glx_drv_o class Driver class to provide drawing window for OpenGL under X11 through the GLX extensions (No GLX support required by X server if Mesa is used!). More...

#include <nt3d_glx_drv_obj.h>

 Make sure that the method is called directly after a Draw() to the VP, as neither a MakeCurrent() nor a Draw() is executed by this method.

Detailed Description

Bug:
unknown
Warning:
When both common and individual contexts are to be used on, make sure that the first VP to open is a common context. Otherwise later opened common VP might miss their propoer drawing object init.
